name: Exposed Wire Trap

Can also be camouflaged as City ruins and Survivor camps to trick players
Adjacent enemy units ending their turn take [20] damage

name: Jungle Replanting Zone
uniques: [+1 Culture, +1 Production] <with [1] to [6] neighboring [City center] tiles>

name: Banana Business Area
uniques: [+1 Gold] <with [1] to [6] neighboring [Jungle Replanting Zone] tiles>

name: Playground
uniques: [+1 Culture, +1 Happiness, +1 Gold] for each adjacent [Banana Business Area]
[+2 Culture, +1 Happiness, -2 Food] for each adjacent [Narcotics farm]
[+2 Food, -1 Happiness] for each adjacent [Prison farm]
[+1 Food, +1 Happiness] for each adjacent [Factory farm]
Cannot be built on [Luxury resource] tiles

name: Landmark
uniques: Can be built just outside your borders

name: Preservator
uniques: Tile provides yield without assigned population
Ensures a minimum tile yield of [+1 Production]
Does not need removal of [Toxic Waste]
Provides [1] [Coal] <in [Hill] tiles> <in tiles without [Forest]> <in tiles without [Jungle]> <in tiles without [Fallout]>
Cannot be built on [Hostile Fauna] tiles
Pillaging this improvement yields approximately [+20 Gold]
